column5: Amazing unit with very nice updates throughout! This unit sleeps 6 with two queen size beds and a queen air mattress. This unit does have cable TV but does not have wifi access in the unit. This condo has all the bells and whistles! This completely remodeled condo is in the best possible location in the heart of New Braunfels, and on the beautiful Comal River.
column8: Nicely Updated Condo on the Comal - Inverness 211
